newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia rubber SIR20 stable in late trading.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia rubber SIR20 stable in late trading.

text.p: Indonesian tyre-grade SIR20 offer prices were stable in slow late trading on Tuesday, with few fresh enquiries heard, dealers said.
Dealers said February/March SIR20 offer prices were at 54.75-55.25 U.S. cents/lb fob Medan, 54.50-54.75 fob Surabaya, Padang and Palembang and at 54.00-54.50 fob Pontianak and Jambi.
"The market stays generally quiet. We've got several fresh enquiries for SIR20 fob Medan and Palembang, but so far we have not secured any deal," one Medan dealer said.
Another dealer said February/March SIR10 fob Medan was on offer at 56.00 cents/lb, but no deals were heard.
Foreign firms last bought February SIR20 at 54.50 fob Palembang in early trading on Tuesday against 54.00 previously. Deals were also heard in Surabaya at 54.00, dealers said.
Dealers said there were no latex deals done. January high amoniac grade latex was on offer at 2,150 rupiah/kg in Bandung and Tangerang and at 2,200 rupiah in Medan.
